name: Paras Mehta
body:
### Hi!
I am a PhD candidate at the Databases and Information Systems working group at FU Berlin. My supervisor is [Prof. Agnès Voisard](http://page.mi.fu-berlin.de/voisard/desktop.html) 

### Previous
Till Sept 2014, I was a member of the European project [GEOCROWD] (http://www.geocrowd.eu). Before that I had the chance to work at [Consult Hyperion](http://www.chyp.com/) as Software Engineer. I did my MSc in Computer Science with the Erasmus Mundus scholarship. It was the best experiences in my life. Which other scholarship gives one the chance to live in England, Spain and Greece! My thesis was on securing mobile commerce using XML Signature and Encryption, with [Prof. Mario Muñoz Organero](http://www.it.uc3m.es/mario/indice.html). 

### Research
My research is in applications of user generated geospatial data in alerting and personalization of information.

### Thesis proposals
Currently open Master Thesis proposal - [Implementation and evaluation of an improved spatial keyword index](http://www.mi.fu-berlin.de/en/inf/groups/ag-db/Theses/spatial_keyword_index/index.html)

### Publications
+ Müller, S., Mehta, P., & Voisard, A. (2014). [Trajectory Aggregation for a Routable Map](http://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007%2F978-3-642-55334-9_3#page-1). In Web and Wireless Geographical Information Systems (pp. 36-53). Springer Berlin Heidelberg.

+ Mehta, Paras, Sebastian Müller, and Agnès Voisard. "[MoveSafe: a framework for transportation mode-based targeted alerting in disaster response.](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2534735)" In Proceedings of the Second ACM SIGSPATIAL International Workshop on Crowdsourced and Volunteered Geographic Information, pp.15-22. ACM, 2013.

+ Mehta, Paras, Agnès Voisard, and Sebastian Müller. "[clustering spatial data streams for targeted alerting in disaster response.](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2534307)" To appear in Proceedings of the 4th ACM SIGSPATIAL International Workshop on GeoStreaming (IWGS) 2013. ACM.

+ Mehta, P., Voisard, A. (2012). [Analysis of User Mobility Data Sources for Multi-User Context Modeling](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2442955), Proceedings of the First ACM SIGSPATIAL International Workshop on Crowdsourced and Volunteered Geographic Information. ACM.

+ Mehta, P., Muñoz Organero, M. Study of Security Mechanisms for Secure Mobile Commerce Architecture through the Development of a Mobile Banking Application. International Review on Computers and Software. Print ISSN: 1828-6003. Cd-Rom ISSN: 1828-6011. January 2009.
